mapper.sql: s.id, s.user_id AS userId, s.parent_id AS parentId, s.depth, s.invite_type AS inviteType, s.invitation_code AS invitationCode, s.apply_explain AS applyExplain, s.status, s.create_date, s.update_by AS "updateBy.id", s.update_date, s.remark
mapper.select:
SELECT , sr.create_date AS date, a.nickname AS name, a.mobile, a.layer AS "newusers.layer", u.nickname AS "users.nickname", u.layer AS "users.layer",
b.balanceAmount AS "mtmySaleRelieveLog.balanceAmount", b.integralAmount AS "mtmySaleRelieveLog.integralAmount" FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users AS a , mtmydb.mtmy_sale_relations_relieve AS s LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_sale_relations AS sr ON sr.user_id = s.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users AS u ON s.parent_id = u.user_id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT rebate_user,receive_user,SUM(balance_amount) AS balanceAmount,SUM(integral_amount) AS integralAmount FROM mtmydb.mtmy_day_account WHERE rebate_flag = 1 GROUP BY rebate_user,receive_user )b ON b.rebate_user = s.user_id AND b.receive_user = s.parent_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.user_id = s.user_id AND s.status = #{status}
AND ( a.nickname LIKE '%'||#{tag }||'%' CONCAT('%', #{tag }, '%') or a.mobile LIKE '%'||#{tag }||'%' CONCAT('%', #{tag }, '%') )
AND DATE_FORMAT(s.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(s.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY s.create_date DESC
SELECT FROM mtmydb.mtmy_sale_relations_relieve AS s WHERE s.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_sale_relations SET depth = CONCAT((SELECT layer FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users WHERE user_id = #{newParentId}),(SELECT layer FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users WHERE user_id = #{userId} )), parent_id = #{newParentId}, status = 0 where user_id = #{userId} AND parent_id = #{parentId}
UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_sale_relations_relieve SET status = #{status}, remark = #{remark}, update_by = #{createBy.name}, update_date = SYSDATE() where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.mobile AS "userMobile", a.name AS "user.name", c.name AS "office.name", r.ABnum, rc.ACnum, r.parent_id, u.user_id AS "users.userid", u.nickname AS "users.nickname", uu.user_balance AS "users.usermoney", uu.user_integral AS "users.paypoints", (SELECT `name` FROM trains.sys_office WHERE `code` = LEFT(c.`code`,9) AND del_flag = '0') AS areaName , (SELECT `name` FROM trains.sys_office WHERE `code` = LEFT(c.`code`,13) AND del_flag = '0') AS groupName , (SELECT `name` FROM trains.sys_office WHERE `code` = LEFT(c.`code`,17) AND del_flag = '0') AS bazaarName FROM trains.sys_user a LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office c ON c.id = a.office_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(parent_id) AS ABnum,parent_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_sale_relations WHERE depth = 'AB' GROUP BY parent_id) AS r ON r.parent_id = a.mtmy_user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(parent_id) AS ACnum,parent_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_sale_relations WHERE depth = 'AC' GROUP BY parent_id) AS rc ON rc.parent_id = a.mtmy_user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users AS u ON u.user_id = a.mtmy_user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_user_accounts AS uu ON uu.user_id = a.mtmy_user_id WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND c.del_flag = 0 AND a.id != '1'
AND( a.name like '%'||#{user.name }||'%' CONCAT('%', #{user.name }, '%') or u.nickname like '%'||#{user.name }||'%' CONCAT('%', #{user.name }, '%') )
AND( a.mobile like '%'||#{user.mobile}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{user.mobile }, '%') or u.mobile like '%'||#{user.mobile }||'%' CONCAT('%', #{user.mobile }, '%') )
AND (c.id = #{office.id} OR c.parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{office.id}||',%') CONCAT('%,', #{office.id}, ',%'))
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.create_date

SELECT a.name AS "user.name", c.name AS "office.name", r.ABnum, rc.ACnum, r.parent_id, u.user_id AS "users.userid", u.nickname AS "users.nickname", uu.user_balance AS "users.usermoney", uu.user_integral AS "users.paypoints", TRUNCATE((b.balance_amount + c.balance_amount),2) AS "mtmySaleRelieveLog.balanceAmount", TRUNCATE((b.integral_amount + c.integral_amount),2) AS "mtmySaleRelieveLog.integralAmount" FROM trains.sys_user a LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office c ON c.id = a.office_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(parent_id) AS ABnum,parent_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_sale_relations WHERE depth = 'AB' GROUP BY parent_id) AS r ON r.parent_id = a.mtmy_user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(parent_id) AS ACnum,parent_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_sale_relations WHERE depth = 'AC' GROUP BY parent_id) AS rc ON rc.parent_id = a.mtmy_user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users AS u ON u.user_id = a.mtmy_user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_user_accounts AS uu ON uu.user_id = a.mtmy_user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT IFNULL(receive_user,#{users.userid }) AS receive_user,IFNULL(SUM(balance_amount),0) AS balance_amount,IFNULL(SUM(integral_amount),0) AS integral_amount FROM mtmydb.mtmy_day_account WHERE receive_user = #{users.userid } AND rebate_flag = 0 ) AS b ON b.receive_user = u.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT IFNULL(receive_user,#{users.userid }) AS receive_user,IFNULL(SUM(balance_amount),0) AS balance_amount,IFNULL(SUM(integral_amount),0) AS integral_amount FROM mtmydb.mtmy_sale_rebates_log WHERE receive_user = #{users.userid } AND rebate_flag = 0) AS c ON c.receive_user = u.user_id WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND c.del_flag = 0 AND u.user_id = #{users.userid }

SELECT create_date, order_id AS "orders.orderid", order_amount AS "orders.orderamount", balance_amount AS balanceAmount, integral_amount AS integralAmount FROM mtmydb.mtmy_sale_rebates_log WHERE rebate_user = #{rebateUser} and receive_user = #{receiveUser} AND rebate_flag = 2

SELECT rabate_date AS rabateDate,SUM(balance_amount) AS balanceAmount,SUM(integral_amount) AS integralAmount,rebate_flag AS rebateFlag FROM mtmydb.mtmy_day_account WHERE receive_user = #{receiveUser} GROUP BY receive_user,rebate_flag,rabate_date UNION SELECT rabate_date AS rabateDate,TRUNCATE(SUM(balance_amount),2) AS balanceAmount,TRUNCATE(SUM(integral_amount),2) AS integralAmount, 0 AS rebateFlag FROM mtmydb.mtmy_sale_rebates_log WHERE rebate_flag = 0 AND receive_user = #{receiveUser} GROUP BY rabate_date

SELECT u.user_id AS "users.userid", u.layer AS "users.layer", u.nickname AS "users.nickname", u.mobile AS "users.mobile", m.nickname AS "newusers.nickname", m.layer AS "newusers.layer", m.user_id AS "newusers.userid", m.mobile AS "newusers.mobile", r.depth, r.create_date, uu.user_balance AS "users.usermoney", uu.user_integral AS "users.paypoints", r.status,
rc.ABnum FROM mtmydb.mtmy_sale_relations AS r LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users AS u ON r.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users AS m ON r.parent_id = m.user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_user_accounts AS uu ON uu.user_id = u.user_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(parent_id) AS ABnum,parent_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_sale_relations WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY parent_id) AS rc ON rc.parent_id = r.user_id WHERE 1=1 AND u.layer = #{layer}
AND ( u.nickname LIKE '%'||#{tag }||'%' CONCAT('%', #{tag }, '%') or u.mobile LIKE '%'||#{tag }||'%' CONCAT('%', #{tag }, '%') )
AND ( m.nickname LIKE '%'||#{newusers.nickname }||'%' CONCAT('%', #{newusers.nickname }, '%') or m.mobile LIKE '%'||#{newusers.nickname }||'%' CONCAT('%', #{newusers.nickname }, '%') )
AND DATE_FORMAT(r.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(r.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY r.create_date DESC

SELECT u.user_id AS 'mtmyUserId', 'A' AS 'grade', (SELECT `name` FROM trains.sys_office WHERE `code` = LEFT(c.`code`,9)) AS 'areaName', (SELECT `name` FROM trains.sys_office WHERE `code` = LEFT(c.`code`,13)) AS 'groupName', (SELECT `name` FROM trains.sys_office WHERE `code` = LEFT(c.`code`,17)) AS 'bazaarName', c.name AS 'shopName', a.name AS 'userName', u.name AS 'mtmyName', a.mobile AS 'userMobile', r.ABnum AS 'bNum', (mrp.param_value - r.ABnum) AS 'surplusNum', u.user_money AS 'totalSurplus', u.pay_points AS 'totalCloudMoney', s.user_id AS 'saleUserId', u2.nickname AS 'bName', u2.mobile AS 'bMobile', u2.reg_time AS 'bRegTime', s.create_date AS 'bCreateTime', (SELECT SUM(balance_amount) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_sale_rebates_log WHERE receive_user = u.user_id AND rebate_user = s.user_id) AS 'bBalanceAmount', (SELECT SUM(integral_amount) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_sale_rebates_log WHERE receive_user = u.user_id AND rebate_user = s.user_id) AS 'bIntegralAmount', (SELECT count(order_id) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_sale_rebates_log WHERE receive_user = u.user_id AND rebate_user = s.user_id) AS 'bOrderNum', (SELECT SUM(order_amount) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_sale_rebates_log WHERE receive_user = u.user_id AND rebate_user = s.user_id) AS 'bOrderAmount', (SELECT o1.create_date FROM mtmydb.mtmy_sale_rebates_log o1 LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_orders o2 ON o1.order_id = o2.order_id WHERE receive_user = u.user_id AND rebate_user = s.user_id LIMIT 1) AS 'firstOrderTime' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_rule_param mrp, trains.sys_user a LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office c ON c.id = a.office_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(parent_id) AS ABnum,parent_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_sale_relations WHERE parent_id >0 GROUP BY parent_id) AS r ON r.parent_id = a.mtmy_user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users AS u ON u.user_id = a.mtmy_user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_sale_relations s ON s.parent_id = a.mtmy_user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users u2 ON u2.user_id = s.user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.del_flag = 0 AND c.del_flag = 0 AND a.id != '1' AND a.mtmy_user_id > 0 AND mrp.param_key = 'sale_invite_userNum_AB'
